net.sf.wubiq.android

Class ImageToBitLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.wubiq.android.BaseImageConversion
      • net.sf.wubiq.android.ImageToBitLine
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageToHex, ImageToPcx

    public class ImageToBitLine
extends BaseImageConversion
    Generates a bit line stream output. These are streams of 8-bit elements. Compatible con Datamax O'Neil apex printers.
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara

      • cutWidth

        protected int cutWidth(MobileDeviceInfo deviceInfo,
                       int width)
        Calculates the cut width based on 8 bit bounded line
        Parameters:
        deviceInfo - Device in perspective.
        width - Original image width.
        Returns:
        The same width or bigger to compensate for the missing bit's.
